channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Huge pothole!, 13th January
item.description:
This has been posted on social media that around 8 people have burst tyres on it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Odessa Park Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are many pot holes along this road that are various sizes but all dangerous, 13th January
item.description:
The potholes are getting worse and are extremely dangerous for both drivers and cyclists. Cars are having to swerve to avoid damaging their cars and this in itself is dangerous. In the dark it’s particularly dangerous as you can’t see them all .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Beech Lodge, 67 The Park, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Degradation to the road surface, 12th January
item.description:
The road surface from the roundabout at the top of Reddings Road down to Bridgend Road has degraded in strips across the carriageway. This is causing the noise and effect of rumble strips and needs urgent attention. The situation is made worse by the volume of buses using the road Some of the strips have been outlined in white paint but not all.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 74 Reddings Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole between lane 2 and 3, southbound, 12th January
item.description:
Large pothole between lane 2 and 3, southbound carriageway 300m or so before Jct 11. Big bang as we drove over and would cause real problem for motorcycle
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Staverton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaging pothole at slip road, 12th January
item.description:
This makes a loud bang when you drive over it. It's where the new surface meets the older surface and there's a poor seal which has let in water and eroded the tarmac. Impossible to see in the dark, but makes a horrible loud bang if you're unlucky to hit it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, The Reddings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes and poor surface, 12th January
item.description:
Around the area of the Esso Garage, on the A40, between Shell Petrol station and princess Elizabeth way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Campden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 6 potholes along St James road and into the car park, unavoidable and damaging, 12th January
item.description:
Please inspect this street, as there are many potholes now along it, most of which look pretty deep from the point of view of a car driver trying to protect my tyres and suspension.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Bethesda Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Further potholes on Woodlands road, 12th January
item.description:
In addition to the deeper one by Canterbury walk, there's now several higher up the road towards Shurdington rd. Lots of gravel on the road now from deep within the road surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Woodlands Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes, 12th January

item.title: Lots of large pot holes off roundabout, 12th January
item.description:
Massive and multiple potholes staight of roundabout. Very harsh on my car. Damaged wheel.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Alma Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Water meter inspection hatch presenting trip hazard, 12th January
item.description:
The water meter inspection hatch outside 14 Millfields is not sitting flush in the ground - looks like it has come away from the surrounding tarmac. I would suggest that it is rectified as a matter of priority - it could easily be tripped over. If someone did trip and hurt themselves I would be prepared to be a witness for them in any claim they made that I had reported the problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Millfields, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge potholes in varios locations, 12th January
item.description:
Made worse by the recent heavy rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Wessex Drive, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: My husband doing Gloucestershire highways job, 12th January
item.description:
This keeps happening they don’t clean the drains on a main busy Road, so when it rains heavily the Road floods as in danger of flooding houses. The rain was up to our door and if my husband had not been in to rush out, as seen in photo out house would have been flooded. This happens a lot and the rain water is washing away our wall. I have reported this many times

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 279 Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet
